basics.label: Packaging Buyer/Research and Development Lead

work.name: Company Name
work.summary: Maintains all purchase orders and vendor acknowledgements. Updates vendor weekly Open Order Reports with accurate ETA's in SAP. Assists in planning, timeline development, and launch of new products. Assist in writing marketing and product development plans.

work.name: Company Name
work.summary: Supervised daily activities relating to operations, receiving, handling and distribution of rigid packaging. Facilitated weekly managers meetings between sales, operations & warehouse teams.
